auth.secureAuthDesc: Our application uses email-based one-time passwords for secure authentication. No need to remember complex passwords - just enter your email and we'll send you a code to log in.
auth.checkEmail: Check your email for the verification code.
auth.otpExpired: One-time password has expired. Please request a new one.
auth.checkEmailForLink: Check your email for the magic link to sign in
auth.sessionError: Session error. Please try logging in again.

welcome.title: Welcome to the App
welcome.nonAuthMessage: Experience secure authentication with email-based authentication. It's amazing.
welcome.authMessage: Access your secure dashboard and manage your profile.

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.description: Sign in with your email to access all features.

profile.title: Your Profile
profile.description: Manage your personal information and preferences.
